infobox.Japanese title:: 幕末維新ミステリーツアー  (Bakumatsu Ishin Misuterī Tsuā)
infobox.Cast:: Conan Edogawa  Kogoro Mouri  Ran Mouri
infobox.Animation director:: Seiji Muta (supervisor)  Hideyuki Motohashi (layout supervisor)  891: Michitaka Yamamoto and Shigenori Taniguchi  892: Chiemi Hironaka, Kanako Ono, Kyoko Yoshimi, and Kosei Takahashi
infobox.Character design:: Masatomo Sudo  Nobuyuki Iwai (sub-character)  Kanako Ono (design works)
infobox.Voice Cast::
Voice Cast:



Minami Takayama as Conan Edogawa  Rikiya Koyama as Kogoro Mouri  Wakana Yamazaki as Ran Mouri  Koichi Tochika as Hiroshi Tsurumi  Yosuke Akimoto as Nobuto Washiyama  Takeshi Kusao as Tetsuya Takajo  Kana Ueda as Asuka Natsume  Tetsuo Goto as Akihiko Takarada  Mitsuaki Madono as Yosuke Fujiki  Chihiro Suzuki as Yuichi Fukuhara  Makoto Kaneko as Rickshaw man  Naoko Komatsu as Message voice

sections.Situation: Kogoro received a letter from a mysterious person called "Kurataya Komakichi", saying he wanted to give him his family treasure. So, Ran and Conan decided to accompany him to Yamaguchi.
sections.People:
- 46 years old
- Yamaguchi North police station assistant-inspector
- 27 years old
- Yamaguchi North police station sergeant
- Victim (kidnapped)

- Asuka's boyfriend
- Rickshaw driver in Hagi
sections.Trivia:
- The cars are a 1966 Red Dino 206 GT and a 2004 Black Nissan Fuga [Y50].
- The truck is a 1999 Isuzu Forward.
- The taxi Kogoro, Ran, and Conan use to go to the park during the second act is from the company Koba Taxi, which had already appeared in Conan Cornered in the Darkness.
